title: Some kind of bug for Super Galaxy Kindred Skin
body:
> [GAMEPLAY/CLIENT] * (unsure but it's a skin problem.) 

{{champion:203}}  I've noticed during my recent kindred games as Super Galaxy Kindred that once i get pass 5 stacks of her passive the auto attack kindred uses are no longer his skins animations, but rather her default skin's auto attack animation, and i was wondering if it will be fixed in later updates or patches.

replies.body:
Hey Excaliberman! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ We've cleaned this up and you should see a fix for this in 6.11!
